comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: Accompanying note: "Mrs. Morris P. Briley looks on as her son, Paxton and Pat Sholar raid the refrigerator, something teenagers usually do only when they can't make it to a drive-in for hamburgers, french fries and soft drinks - and to 'see who's there,' which is the most important reason for going."
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida

comment.author: 35607158@N06
comment._content: I guess Mrs. Briley is a happy woman if the worst her teenage son gets up to is raiding the fridge for milk.

comment.author: 27032987@N02
comment._content: when i was a kid you could cut out the F logo from the milk cartons & send away for stuff , or maybe redeem them at the grocery store, can't remember exactly!?!!
